posts.post_content:
Just got these back from SGC today. All forms of payment accepted. Regular PayPal add $1.50 per card to cover fees. Shipping is a flat $3 if you buy 1 card or all of them. Sorry for the bad cell phone pics, if you would like a better pic of a card let me know. All prices are firm and as low as I can go even with purchase of multiple cards. Would also trade for Series 3 Ft Worth players raw or graded.

Series 1
Norcum $40
Marshall $40
Radebaugh $40
Howard $70

Series 2
Schrader $80
Rowe $40 SOLD
Sharp $40
Lovell $40 TRADED
Clunk $40 SOLD
Kirkpatrick $40
Lawlor $35 SOLD
Messitt $35 SOLD
Cefalu $45 TRADED

Series 3
Spangler $35
Rose $40

Berlick $45 SOLD

Series 7
Steinbach $40
Steinbach $40 Sold Right card in Picture (016)
Anybody else before I put them on eBay Sunday?

Besides T210 Series 3 Ft Worth cards I would also trade for a low end 55 Bowman Hank Aaron or common beater T206 cards with non Sweet Caporal, Sovereign, or Piedmont backs I need for my cigarette brand back run.
GLWS, don't have any series 4's hiding anywhere do you?

[quote name="scoobysnacksforyou" post=1643000]GLWS, don't have any series 4's hiding anywhere do you?[/QUOTE]

No, those are all the extras I have. GL finding the Series 4's you need.
thanks they have become really tough the last couple of years

I would also trade for common T205 cards in lower condition. Also doing a cigarette brand back run in those. Don't have any at the moment.

These are the 55 Bowmans I would trade for. 67, 179, 235, 242, 250, 258, 277. 283, 286, 291, 293, 302, 307, and 320. Also lower end cards to match the rest of the set.
Still have 17 of these beautiful cards for sale/trade.:)
